divs: Sighting DetailsI would like the person reporting this story to report a day and time. I believe I witnessed the same object as well, but would like more info to know for sure. I had a feeling of something more as well and also photographed it because of the strange feeling about the rate of speed it was traveling at such a high altitude and also more. Please report day and approximate time so I can know if it was in fact the same object and pursue from there. Original post: My wife and I went to Erwin park, she was walking the dogs and I was flying an rc electric airplane. The air was almost still only a few clouds in the sky. I had the plane in the air just about five min. As my plane came around to the east I could see a white sphere traveling from north to south. It lookded to be about 5,000.ft up. At an angle from me about 40 deg. It's size was about the size of a thumb tack head. The sphere looked like it was just north of McKinney. It was traveling at a steady clip fairly quickly across the sky. I circled the rc plane to keep it east of me so I could keep a watch on the sphere. I saw my wife comming at a distace I turned and called to her to look and I lost site of the white sphere. She didn't here me telling her to look. But when she found out what I was saying she took some pictures of the sky. I'm inclosing one of the pictures of what she took with the camera. I think it is just a jet plane and it's vapor trail. She seems to think it is more, I'll let you decide.
Summary: Person reporting w/photo of object north of McKinney flying from North to South?
